PARAMETER.NAME: inputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: name of the annotationSet used for input (Token and Sentence annotations)

PARAMETER.NAME: outputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: name of the annotationSet used for output

PARAMETER.NAME: parserFile
PARAMETER.COMMENT: path to the parser's grammar file

PARAMETER.NAME: mappingFile
PARAMETER.COMMENT: path to the tag mapping file

PARAMETER.NAME: addPosTags
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Create POS tags on the Token annotations

PARAMETER.NAME: reusePosTags
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Re-use existing POS tags on tokens

PARAMETER.NAME: addConstituentAnnotations
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Create annotations to show phrase structures

PARAMETER.NAME: addDependencyFeatures
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Create dependency features on Token annotations

PARAMETER.NAME: tlppClass
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Class name of the TreebankLangParserParams implementation used to extract the dependencies
